content:
Check:
  all:
    - context: RDOMAIN
      name: IDVAR
      operator: is_not_valid_relationship
      value: IDVARVAL
Core:
  Id: CORE-000206
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When IDVAR is populated, IDVARVAL must equal a value of the variable
  referenced by IDVAR within the domain referenced by RDOMAIN
Outcome:
  Message: IDVARVAL does not equal a value of variable=IDVAR in domain=RDOMAIN
  Output Variables:
    - RDOMAIN
    - USUBJID
    - IDVAR
    - IDVARVAL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0371
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: IDVARVAL
                Section: Comments
              - Cited Guidance: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: IDVARVAL
                Section: Supplemental Qualifiers
              - Cited Guidance: Value of identifying variable described in IDVAR.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: IDVARVAL
                Section: Related Records
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO
      - SUPP--
      - RELREC

json.Description: When IDVAR is populated, IDVARVAL must equal a value of the variable referenced by IDVAR within the domain referenced by RDOMAIN

Outcome.Message: IDVARVAL does not equal a value of variable=IDVAR in domain=RDOMAIN

Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).
